task.title: Orchestrate : Editing Account Page Layouts for Business Processes
task.shortdesc: Created by user-0266f, last modified by William Abernathy on Sep 20, 2023

taskbody.context: To view the business processes related to an account:

step.cmd: In Setup, enter Accounts in the Quick Find.
Click Edit next to the page layout to which you're adding the Business Processes related list.
Drag and drop the Business Processes (Account) section onto the page layout.
Select the Related List Properties (wrench) icon in the Business Processes related list.
Add the following fields to the Selected Fields frame.
Select any other fields you want in the related list and order the fields as needed.
Repeat the steps above to add the Recurring Business Processes related list to any applicable account page layouts. In Related List Properties, add the following fields to the Selected Fields frame:
Select the plus sign icon in the Buttons frame.
De-select the New checkbox and click the OK button.
Click the Save button in the Page Layout editor.
